property.name: objectLabel
property.value: Lpr Transaction Item

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: A transaction item represents a request for creating a new relation of a person (student) to a LUI. The transaction item also handle removing, updating, swapping out an old LUI for a new LUI for a person.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Person Id

property.name: summary
property.value: The person id for whom this request is to generate or update the lpr

property.name: label
property.value: Person Id

property.name: description
property.value: The person id for whom this request is to generate or update the lpr

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Transaction Id

property.name: summary
property.value: The identifier of the transaction that contains this transaction item.

property.name: label
property.value: Transaction Id

property.name: description
property.value: The identifier of the transaction that contains this transaction item.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: New Lui Id

property.name: summary
property.value: The LUI id for a new relation request.

property.name: label
property.value: New LUI Id

property.name: description
property.value: The LUI id for a new relation request.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Existing Lui Id

property.name: summary
property.value: The existing LUI id for an existing relation remove or change requests.

property.name: label
property.value: Existing Lui Id

property.name: description
property.value: The existing LUI id for an existing relation remove or change requests.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Result Values Group Keys

property.name: summary
property.value: The keys of the result values groups to be applied to the LPR once created.

property.name: label
property.value: Result Values Group Keys

property.name: elementLabel
property.value: Result Values Group Key

property.name: description
property.value:
The keys of the result values groups to be applied to the LPR once created.
For example, setting the grading option to pass/fail or the credits to 3 for a course.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Request Options

property.name: summary
property.value: Specify the various request (or registration ) options for creating this relationship.

property.name: label
property.value: Request Options

property.name: elementLabel
property.value: Request Option

property.name: description
property.value: Specify the various request (or registration ) options for creating this relationship.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Lpr Transaction Item Result

property.name: summary
property.value: Returns the result for this transaction item once it has been processed.

property.name: label
property.value: LPR Transaction Item Result

property.name: description
property.value: Returns the result for this transaction item once it has been processed.

property.name: objectLabel
property.value: LPR Transaction Item Result

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: Returns the result for this transaction item once it has been processed.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Resulting Lpr Id

property.name: summary
property.value: The resulting LPR for this LPR transaction item if its successful.

property.name: label
property.value: Resulting Lpr Id

property.name: description
property.value:
The resulting LPR for this LPR transaction item if its successful.
Returns null if unsuccessful, valid lpr id in case of success

property.name: summary
property.value: The message for the transaction In case of success, there may still be warning messages

property.name: description
property.value: The message for the transaction In case of success, there may still be warning messages

property.name: summary
property.value: The status of the transaction.

property.name: description
property.value:
The status of the transaction.
Returns true in case transaction item had a successful result, false otherwise.

property.name: summary
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: description
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Type Key

property.name: summary
property.value: The type of the transaction item.

property.name: label
property.value: Type Key

property.name: description
property.value:
The type of the transaction item.
The types of LPR transaction item are things like ADD, UPDATE, DROP, and SWAP

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: State Key

property.name: summary
property.value:
The state of this transaction item
The states of the LPR transaction item are things like DRAFT, SUBMITTED, and FAILED. etc

property.name: label
property.value: State Key

property.name: description
property.value:
The state of this transaction item
The states of the LPR transaction item are things like DRAFT, SUBMITTED, and FAILED. etc

property.name: summary
property.value: Create and last update info for the structure.

property.name: description
property.value:
Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.
Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value:
Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.
Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.
